entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
